description:
A man named Aota moves into the building for a month. When he asks Kotarou to be his friend, Karino gets suspicious — and a little jealous.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Arata na Nyuukyosha / Nanimono Da!? / Iranu!! / Tsuyoku Naritai / Sono Koe wa / Meitantei
新たな入居者 / 何者だ!? / いらぬ!! / 強くなりたい / その声は / 名探偵
